name: NUCLEAR ENERGY INSTITUTE (NEI)
description: policy organization of the nuclear energy and technologies industry
sampleDescriptions: H.R.1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2018 (P.L.115-141); issues related to nuclear waste.

Issues related to the development of U.S. energy policy specifically nuclear energy policy;
H.R.3053, Nuclear Waste Policy Amendments Act of 2017.
H.R.5357, Nuclear Cooperation Reform Act of 2018; issues related to 123 Agreements.

Issues related to the development of U.S. energy policy specifically nuclear energy and nuclear waste policy;
H.R.5895/S.2975, Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 201
